solution_line_template: From the {initial_cookies} cookies, Javier's wife ate {wife_percentage}*{initial_cookies} = <<{wife_percentage}*{initial_cookies}={wife_ate_cookies}>>{wife_ate_cookies}

After the wife ate {wife_ate_cookies} cookies, the number of cookies that remained was {initial_cookies}-{wife_ate_cookies} = <<{initial_cookies}-{wife_ate_cookies}={cookies_after_wife}>>{cookies_after_wife}

The daughter also ate {daughter_ate_cookies} cookies leaving {cookies_after_wife}-{daughter_ate_cookies} = <<{cookies_after_wife}-{daughter_ate_cookies}={cookies_after_daughter}>>{cookies_after_daughter} cookies.
If Javier ate half of the remaining cookies, he ate {javier_fraction}*{cookies_after_daughter} = {javier_ate_cookies}.
The number of cookies that remained is {cookies_after_daughter}-{javier_ate_cookies} = <<{cookies_after_daughter}-{javier_ate_cookies}={cookies_remaining}>>{cookies_remaining}
